name: Vitas Morbas
description:
Vitas Morbas

Play as a Futuristic soldier battling creatures through the dark depths of the dungeon. 

Your goal is to defeat as many enemies as you can to take it over, try not to die as you will only have one shot. 

Controls 

shoot = left click 

move = arrow keys/wasd

esc = pause (during game)
